ko.name: 꿈에서 태어난 존재

ko.description: <color=yellow>분해의 성소</color> 이용 시 보상으로 받는 골드의 50%<sprite=5>만큼 추가로 <color=yellow>꿈가루</color>를 획득합니다.
ko.rawDesc: <color=yellow>분해의 성소</color> 이용 시 보상으로 받는 골드의 {0}만큼 추가로 <color=yellow>꿈가루</color>를 획득합니다.

en.name: Dream-born
en.lore: Knowing the truth and facing it are different matters. How would it feel to see a fairy tale with your own story written in it?
en.description: When using the <color=yellow>Shrine of Dismantling</color>, gain additional <color=yellow>Dream Dust</color> equal to 50%<sprite=5> of the Gold received as a reward.
en.rawDesc: When using the <color=yellow>Shrine of Dismantling</color>, gain additional <color=yellow>Dream Dust</color> equal to {0} of the Gold received as a reward.

zh.name: 梦境之生
zh.lore: 知晓真相与直面真相，是截然不同的体验。亲眼见到写有自己故事的童话，会是怎样的心情呢？
zh.description: 使用<color=yellow>分解圣坛</color>时，额外获得相当于奖励金币50%<sprite=5>的<color=yellow>梦尘</color>。
zh.rawDesc: 使用<color=yellow>分解圣坛</color>时，额外获得相当于奖励金币{0}的<color=yellow>梦尘</color>。

ja.name: 夢から生まれし存在
ja.lore: 真実を知ることと向き合うことは別の話です。自分の物語が書かれた童話を直接見るのはどんな気分でしょうか？
ja.description: <color=yellow>分解の聖堂</color>利用時に報酬として受け取るゴールドの50%<sprite=5>分追加で<color=yellow>ドリームダスト</color>を獲得します。
ja.rawDesc: <color=yellow>分解の聖堂</color>利用時に報酬として受け取るゴールドの{0}分追加で<color=yellow>ドリームダスト</color>を獲得します。

ko.name: 동화 속의 신
ko.description: <color=yellow>최대 체력</color>이 10% 감소하지만 모든 경로에서 획득하는 <color=yellow>꿈가루</color>가 10%<sprite=5> 증가합니다.

en.name: God in a Fairy Tale
en.description: Your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> is reduced by 10%, but you gain 10%<sprite=5> increased <color=yellow>Dream Dust</color> from all sources.
en.rawDesc: Your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> is reduced by {0}, but you gain {1} increased <color=yellow>Dream Dust</color> from all sources.

zh.name: 童话中的神
zh.description: <color=yellow>体力上限</color>降低10%，但通过所有路径获得的<color=yellow>梦之尘</color>增加10%<sprite=5>。
zh.rawDesc: <color=yellow>体力上限</color>降低{0}，但通过所有路径获得的<color=yellow>梦之尘</color>增加{1}。

ja.name: 童話の神
ja.description: <color=yellow>最大HP</color>が10%減少しますが、その代わりに、すべての方法で獲得する<color=yellow>ドリームダスト</color>が10%<sprite=5>増加します。

ko.name: 과자 굽기
ko.description: 적 처치 시 0.5%<sprite=5> 확률로 <color=yellow>별과자</color>가 생성됩니다. <color=yellow>별과자</color>는 유바르의 체력을 약간 회복하고 소량의 골드와 꿈가루를 제공합니다.

en.name: Cookie Baker
en.description: Defeating enemies has a 0.5%<sprite=5> chance to create a <color=yellow>Star Cookie</color>. <color=yellow>Star Cookies</color> restore a small amount of Yubar's Health and grant a small amount of Gold and Dream Dust.
en.rawDesc: Defeating enemies has a {0} chance to create a <color=yellow>Star Cookie</color>. <color=yellow>Star Cookies</color> restore a small amount of Yubar's Health and grant a small amount of Gold and Dream Dust.

zh.name: 烘焙点心
zh.description: 击杀敌人时，有0.5%<sprite=5>概率生成<color=yellow>星星饼干</color>。<color=yellow>星星饼干</color>可为尤巴尔回复少量生命，并提供少量金币和梦尘。

ja.description: 敵を撃破した時、0.5%<sprite=5>の確率で<color=yellow>スタークッキー</color>が生成されます。<color=yellow>スタークッキー</color>はユバールのHPを少し回復し、少量のゴールドとドリームダストを与えます。
